animeDescription: Mike is a penguin soldier who returns home after being injured during combat. Estranged from his family and friends, he leaves his hometown and starts to roam adrift through the country.(Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Moriwaki, Makoto', 'Storyboard'], ['Hikone, Norio', 'Storyboard, Original Character Design'], ['Kanemori, Yoshinori', 'Animation Director, Character Design'], ['Nagaoka, Akinori', 'Chief Animation Director']]
